verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who went <S%H5927>up<s%> with <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> and <S%H3442>Jeshua:<s%> <S%H8304>Seraiah,<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H5830>Ezra,<s%>
<S%H568>Amariah,<s%> <S%H4409>Malluch,<s%> <S%H2407>Hattush,<s%>
<S%H7935>Shecaniah,<s%> <S%H7348>Rehum,<s%> <S%H4822>Meremoth,<s%>
<S%H5714>Iddo,<s%> <S%H1599>Ginnethoi,<s%> <S%H29>Abijah,<s%>
<S%H4326>Mijamin,<s%> <S%H4573>Maadiah,<s%> <S%H1083>Bilgah,<s%>
<S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and <S%H3114>Joiarib,<s%> <S%H3048>Jedaiah.<s%>

<S%H5543>Sallu,<s%> <S%H5987>Amok,<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> <S%H3048>Jedaiah.<s%> These were the <S%H7218>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and of their <S%H251>brothers<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> <S%H1131>Binnui,<s%> <S%H6934>Kadmiel,<s%> <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> who was over the <S%H1960>thanksgiving,<s%> he and his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
Also <S%H1229>Bakbukiah<s%> and <S%H6042>Unno,<s%> their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were over against them according to their <S%H4931>offices.<s%>

<S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3113>Joiakim,<s%> and <S%H3113>Joiakim<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib,<s%> and <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3111>Joiada,<s%>
and <S%H3111>Joiada<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3129>Jonathan,<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3037>Jaddua.<s%>

In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3113>Joiakim<s%> were <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H8304>households:<s%> of Seraiah, <S%H4811>Meraiah;<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah;<s%>
of <S%H5830>Ezra,<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam;<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> <S%H3076>Jehohanan;<s%>
of <S%H4409>Malluchi,<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan;<s%> of <S%H7645>Shebaniah,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph;<s%>
of <S%H2766>Harim,<s%> <S%H5733>Adna;<s%> of <S%H4812>Meraioth,<s%> <S%H2517>Helkai;<s%>
of <S%H5714>Iddo,<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah;<s%> of <S%H1599>Ginnethon,<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam;<s%>
of <S%H29>Abijah,<s%> <S%H2147>Zichri;<s%> of <S%H4509>Miniamin,<s%> of <S%H4153>Moadiah,<s%> <S%H6408>Piltai;<s%>
of <S%H1083>Bilgah,<s%> <S%H8051>Shammua;<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> <S%H3083>Jehonathan;<s%>
and of <S%H3114>Joiarib,<s%> <S%H4982>Mattenai;<s%> of <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%> <S%H5813>Uzzi;<s%>
of <S%H5543>Sallai,<s%> <S%H7040>Kallai;<s%> of <S%H5987>Amok,<s%> <S%H5677>Eber;<s%>
of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah;<s%> of <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%> <S%H5417>Nethanel.<s%>

As for the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib,<s%> <S%H3111>Joiada,<s%> and <S%H3110>Johanan,<s%> and <S%H3037>Jaddua,<s%> there were <S%H3789>recorded<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H3548>households;<s%> also the priests, in the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H6542>Persian.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H3789>households,<s%> were written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles,<s%> even until the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib.<s%>

The <S%H7218>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> and <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6934>Kadmiel,<s%> with their <S%H251>brothers<s%> over against <S%H1984>them,<s%> to praise and give <S%H1984>thanks,<s%> according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4929>watch<s%> <S%H5980>next<s%> to <S%H4929>watch.<s%>

<S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> and <S%H1229>Bakbukiah,<s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> <S%H2929>Talmon,<s%> <S%H6126>Akkub,<s%> were <S%H7778>porters<s%> <S%H8104>keeping<s%> the <S%H4929>watch<s%> at the <S%H624>storehouses<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

These were in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3113>Joiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3136>Jozadak,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%> the <S%H6346>governor,<s%> and of <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe.<s%>

At the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> they <S%H1245>sought<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> out of all their <S%H4725>places,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> with <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> both with giving <S%H8426>thanks,<s%> and with <S%H7892>singing,<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%> stringed <S%H5035>instruments,<s%> and with <S%H3658>harps.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H7891>singers<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together,<s%> both out of the <S%H3603>plain<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and from the <S%H2691>villages<s%> of the <S%H5200>Netophathites;<s%>

also from <S%H1004>Beth<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and out of the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of <S%H1387>Geba<s%> and <S%H5820>Azmaveth:<s%> for the <S%H7891>singers<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> them <S%H2691>villages<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
The <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H2891>purified<s%> <S%H2891>themselves;<s%> and they purified the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall.<s%>

Then I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> and <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> companies who gave <S%H8426>thanks<s%> and went in <S%H8418>procession.<s%> One went on the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall<s%> toward the <S%H830>dung<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%>
and <S%H310>after<s%> them <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H1955>Hoshaiah,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%>
and <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> <S%H5830>Ezra,<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%>
<S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%>

and certain of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>' <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets:<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3129>Jonathan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4320>Micaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2139>Zaccur,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph;<s%>

and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and <S%H5832>Azarel,<s%> <S%H4450>Milalai,<s%> <S%H1562>Gilalai,<s%> <S%H4597>Maai,<s%> <S%H5417>Nethanel,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> with the <S%H7892>musical<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> was before <S%H6440>them.<s%>

By the <S%H5869>spring<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and straight before <S%H5927>them,<s%> they went up by the <S%H4609>stairs<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> at the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> above the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> even to the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4217>eastward.<s%>

The <S%H8145>other<s%> company of those who gave <S%H8426>thanks<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H4136>meet<s%> <S%H310>them,<s%> and I after <S%H2677>them,<s%> with the half of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> above the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of the <S%H8574>furnaces,<s%> even to the <S%H7342>broad<s%> <S%H2346>wall,<s%>

and above the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and by the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and by the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H2606>Hananel,<s%> and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H3968>Hammeah,<s%> even to the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H8179>gate:<s%> and they stood <S%H5975>still<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard.<s%>

So <S%H5975>stood<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> companies of those who gave <S%H8426>thanks<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H2677>I,<s%> and the half of the rulers with <S%H5461>me;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H471>Eliakim,<s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> <S%H4509>Miniamin,<s%> <S%H4320>Micaiah,<s%> <S%H454>Elioenai,<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets;<s%>

and <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> and <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H5813>Uzzi,<s%> and <S%H3076>Jehohanan,<s%> and <S%H4441>Malchijah,<s%> and <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H5829>Ezer.<s%> The <S%H7891>singers<s%> sang <S%H8085>loud,<s%> with <S%H3156>Jezrahiah<s%> their <S%H6496>overseer.<s%>

They <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoiced;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> had made them <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8057>joy;<s%> and the <S%H802>women<s%> also and the <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced:<s%> so that the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> even afar <S%H7350>off.<s%>

On that <S%H3117>day<s%> were <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6485>appointed<s%> over the <S%H5393>rooms<s%> for the <S%H214>treasures,<s%> for the wave <S%H8641>offerings,<s%> for the first <S%H7225>fruits,<s%> and for the <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> to <S%H3664>gather<s%> into <S%H7704>them,<s%> according to the fields of the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> the <S%H4521>portions<s%> appointed by the <S%H8451>law<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> for <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8057>rejoiced<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who <S%H5975>waited.<s%>

They <S%H8104>performed<s%> the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of their <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H2893>purification,<s%> and so did the <S%H7891>singers<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters,<s%> according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

For in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H623>Asaph<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%> there was a <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> and <S%H7892>songs<s%> of <S%H8416>praise<s%> and <S%H3034>thanksgiving<s%> to <S%H430>God.<s%>

All <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5166>Nehemiah,<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4521>portions<s%> of the <S%H7891>singers<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters,<s%> as every <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1697>required:<s%> and they set <S%H6942>apart<s%> that which was for the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> set <S%H6942>apart<s%> that which was for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>
